name: semi-nonfunctional NZ Herald Paywall Unblocker
description:
NZME have finally implemented the most basic of JavaScript blocking // albeit this is literally only a redirect // so basically still piss easy to skip with any good adblock client. It does mean however that this userstyle no longer works as Stylus/Stylish doesn't support changing scripts. 

https://old.reddit.com/r/newzealand/comments/bwii6k/nzh_premium_latest_update_to_ublockadblock_filter/

Adblock filter options above. This will be preserved for archival purposes. 

This is what happens when you implement useless client-side security, in CSS...
